segments.text: How do you like the food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It tastes really great . Did you cook it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I made it this afternoon . Would you like some more ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , just a little though . I'm really full .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . Would you like some soup instead ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tomato and rice . Have you had that before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . This is my first time . How does it taste ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's good , try it . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow . It is good . Did you make that also ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , next time I'll make chicken soup for us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds good . Did you study cooking in school ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I learned by myself . I have a good cook book that I read when I have time .
segments.speaker: S1
